strategy: Craftworld Saim-Hann armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Shining Spears, Aspect Warriors, Titans, and the Avatar formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Eldar Craftworld Saim-Hann.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Saim-Hann Warhosts
sections.description: Up to one Aspect Warrior or Mounted Guardian Warhost for each Wild Rider Warhost

formations.name: Wild Rider Warhost
extraUnits: Replace any number of Wild Riders with Saim-Hann Vypers: Free
(0-1 per army) Replace one unit of Wild Riders with a Wild Rider Chieftain: 50 points

formations.name: Mounted Guardian Warhost
formations.units: Three Wave Serpents, Farseer, five Guardians
extraUnits: Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platforms: Free

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Eight Shining Spears and/or Swooping Hawks
extraUnits: Add up to two Exarchs: 25 points each

sections.name: Saim-Hann Troupes
sections.description: Up to three for each Saim-Hann Warhost taken

formations.name: Wild Rider Troupe
extraUnits: Replace any number of Wild Riders with Saim-Hann Vypers: Free

formations.name: Mounted Aspect Warrior Troupe
formations.units: Three Wave Serpents and six Aspect Warriors chosen from the following: Dark Reapers, Dire Avengers, Fire Dragons, Howling Banshees, Striking Scorpions

formations.name: Engines of Vaul
formations.units: One Engine of Vaul chosen from the following: Cobra, Deathstalker, Scorpion, Storm Serpent
extraUnits: Add up to two Cobra, Scorpion, Deathstalker, and/or Storm Serpent: 200 points each

formations.name: Swords of Vaul
extraUnits: Replace up to two Falcons with Firestorms: Free
Add five Guardians to the formation: 75 points
Replace up to three Eldar Guardians with Eldar Heavy Weapon Platforms: Free

formations.name: Hornet Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two Saim-Hann Hornets: 50 points each

formations.name: War Walker Troupe
extraUnits: Add up to two War Walkers: 25 points each

sections.name: Saim-Hann Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Saim-Hann Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add one Eldar Exarch to a unit of Aspect Warriors
